introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this video is すなお which you will often hear in conversations about personality traits. Imagine how much more natural your Japanese will sound when you can say things like "She is honest with her feelings," "I appreciate your straightforwardness," and "He is obedient to his parents" in Japanese. Let's get started!
meaning_explanation_english: The word すなお means honest, straightforward, or obedient. It describes someone who is frank and does not hide their feelings or thoughts.

common_words: 素顔: face with no make-up

kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 純真 : じゅんしん : pure
率直 : そっちょく : frank
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of すなお are じゅんしん and そっちょく. じゅんしん means pure or innocent, often used to describe someone who is naive or untainted by experiences. In contrast, そっちょく means frank or candid, and is used when someone speaks plainly, often without concern for politeness. While both suggest honesty, じゅんしん leans more towards innocence, while そっちょく emphasizes directness.
antonyms: 不誠実 : ふせいじつ : insincerity
ひねくれ者 : ひねくれもの : contrary person
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of すなお are ふせいじつ and ひねくれ. ふせいじつ means dishonest or insincere, describing someone who hides their true intentions or feelings. ひねくれ means cynical or twisted, often referring to someone who has a jaded or negative outlook, making them distrustful of straightforwardness. These words highlight a lack of honesty or openness, contrasting sharply with すなお.

collocations.kanji: 素直な気持ち (すなおなきもち)
collocations.furigana: 素直な気持ち (すなおなきもち)

collocations.kanji: 素直に言う (すなおにいう)
collocations.furigana: 素直に言う (すなおにいう)

collocations.kanji: 素直な性格 (すなおなせいかく)
collocations.furigana: 素直な性格 (すなおなせいかく)

collocations.kanji: 素直に従う (すなおにしたがう)
collocations.furigana: 素直に従う (すなおにしたがう)

collocations.kanji: 素直な反応 (すなおなはんのう)
collocations.furigana: 素直な反応 (すなおなはんのう)

example_sentences.kanji: 素直な気持ちを伝えました。
example_sentences.furigana: 素直(すなお)な気持(きも)ちを伝(つた)えました。

translations.VI: Tôi đã truyền đạt cảm xúc chân thành của mình.
translations.NE: मैले मेरो इमानदार भावना व्यक्त गरेँ।
translations.BN: আমি আমার সৎ অনুভূতিটি প্রকাশ করেছি.
translations.ZH: 我表达了我诚实的感情。
translations.TL: Ipinaabot ko ang aking tapat na nararamdamin.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်၏၀န်ခံရသောခံစားချက်ကို အသိပေးခဲ့သည်။
translations.HI: मैंने अपनी ईमानदार भावनाएँ व्यक्त कीं।

example_sentences.furigana: 私は(わたしは)素直(すなお)に言う(いう)。

translations.VI: Tôi nói một cách thẳng thắn.
translations.MY: ကျွန်တော့ စနေနဲ့ ပြောပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं इसे ईमानदारी से कहता हूँ।

example_sentences.furigana: 彼（かれ）は素直（すなお）な性格（せいかく）です。

translations.VI: Anh ấy có tính cách chân thật.
translations.TL: Siya ay may tapat na pagkatao.
translations.MY: သူမှာသရုပ်မှတ်ခွင့်ရှိပြီး ဟိုင်ဒီထွက်ရှားခဲ့သည်။
translations.FA: او یک شخصیت ساده و صادق دارد.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は素直(すなお)に従(したが)う。

translations.VI: Anh ấy tuân theo một cách chân thành.
translations.MY: သူသည် ရင်ခုန်လျှင် လိုက်နာပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह ईमानदारी से पालन करता है।
translations.FA: او به راحتی پیروی می کند.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は素直な反応を示した。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は素直(すなお)な反応(はんのう)を示(しめ)した。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đã thể hiện một phản ứng chân thành.
translations.FR: Il a montré une réaction sincère.
translations.ZH: 他表现出了一个真诚的反应。
translations.TL: Ipinakita niya ang isang taos-pusong reaksyon.
translations.MY: သူက လေးစားသော တုံ့ပြန်မှုကို ပြသခဲ့သည်။
translations.FA: او یک واکنش صادقانه نشان داد.

honest.MY: ရယ်ယွားတယ်

straight.MY: တိုက်ရိုက်

without peculiarity.MY: ကန့်သတ်သောအရာမရှိ
